p: We also selected the 10% most relevant images ( n = 32; M = 7.537, SD = 1.304) and the 10% least relevant images ( n = 32; M = 4.121, SD = 1.678) to be used in further correlation analyses. Common themes depicted in the most relevant images were polar bears, ice floes, industrial smog, and outcomes of natural disasters ( Figure 3), while common themes depicted in the least relevant images were landscapes, buildings, and people ( Figure 4).
